Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a blog post or article within the Digital Nomad Compass application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Article entity.

content.description: The main text content of the article.

publicationDate.description: The date and time when the article was published.

tags.description: Tags associated with the article to improve searchability.

imageUrl.description: URL of the main image associated with the article.

isPro.description: Whether this article is exclusive to PRO members.

User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the Digital Nomad Compass application.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

email.description: The email address of the user.

role.description: The role of the user, determining their access level.

invites.description: Number of invitation codes this user has available to give out.

InviteCode.title: InviteCode
InviteCode.description: Represents an invitation code for new user registration.

createdBy.description: The UID of the user who generated this code.

isUsed.description: Whether this invitation code has been used.

usedBy.description: The UID of the user who used this code.

definition.description: Stores user profiles, roles, and invite counts. Access is restricted to the user themselves, but roles are publicly readable for rules.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores all invitation codes. Codes can be read to check validity before use.
Stores all articles. All users can read non-PRO articles. Write access is restricted to admins.

params.name: articleId
params.description: The unique identifier of the article.
